plot outline: Puthooramputhri Unniyarcha is a 2002 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P. G. Viswambharan and Produced by K. Ramakrishnan. The film stars Vani Viswanath, Devan, Siddique, Captain Raju and Kunchacko Boban in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Johnson.
title: Puthooramputhri Unniyarcha
plot: Unniyarcha proves to be equal to her brother and cousin, both renowned warriors. When her cousin betrays her brother during a duel, Unniyarcha vows to take revenge.

_Puthooramputhri Unniyarcha_ (qv) is a 2002 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P. G. Viswambharan and Produced by K. Ramakrishnan. The film stars Vani Viswanath, Devan, Siddique, Captain Raju and Kunchacko Boban in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Johnson.
